explains: n. 屠宰场（等于 abattoir）；屠杀场

sentences.en: Essentially, all wool is a slaughterhouse product.
sentences.cn: 从本质上讲，所有的羊毛都是屠宰场的产物。

sentences.en: They have a right to go into a slaughterhouse and, bang, it's done.
sentences.cn: 它们有权利走进屠宰场，并且砰的一下就结束掉。

sentences.en: This represents a role model for cleaner slaughterhouse operations.
sentences.cn: 这代表着更清洁的屠宰操作的模式。
